Module com.example.softmeth4
Package com.example.softmeth4.businesslogic

Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmeth4.businesslogic.Order
public class Order extends Object
This class represents a customer's pizza order and contains methods to get and set information about an order, calculate total costs for the order, and methods to return information about an order in a string representation.
